titleStmt.title: English liberty and property asserted in pursuance of the statute laws of this common-wealth. Discovering Israels sin in chusing a king, by several questions humbly propounded to the grave senators at Westminster. And to all others, who have the power of this nation in their hands.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Livewell Chapman at the Crown in Popes-head-Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
